name: 1dBandpass
author: AFNI Developers
description: Bandpass filtering of time series data in AFNI *.1D files

inputs.description: Lowest frequency in the passband, in Hz (must be greater than or equal to 0)
inputs.name: Lowest Frequency

inputs.description: Highest frequency in the passband, in Hz (must be greater than FBOT)
inputs.name: Highest Frequency

inputs.description: Input AFNI *.1D file; each column is processed
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: Set time step to 'dd' sec (default is 1.0)
inputs.name: Time Step

inputs.description: Also orthogonalize input to columns in specified *.1D file (only one '-ort' option is allowed)
inputs.name: Orthogonalize File

inputs.description: Skip the quadratic detrending of the input
inputs.name: No Detrending

inputs.description: Make output time series have L2 norm = 1
inputs.name: Normalize
